p: Male and female SPF C57BL/6J mice (20± 2g) at 6–8 weeks old were purchased from Shanghai slack laboratory animal co., LTD (Shanghai, China). Animals were housed for 5 days for acclimation with 12-hour light-dark cycles and maintained with standard pellet feed and water ad libitum. The 50% mouse lethal dose (MLD 50) was calculated by the method of Reed and Muench through a preliminary test. During experiment, 80 mice were randomly divided into 5 groups (n = 16) using the random number table and anesthetized by intraperitoneal injection of ketamine (100 mg/kg). In each group, there were half of male and female mice.
